message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed to revolutionize your industry. With its cutting-edge features and unparalleled capabilities, this product has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. We're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000, reflecting its high value and the opportunity it presents for your company.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $1500000 for a similar product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1400000 to reflect my maximum spending capacity.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to negotiate further. After careful consideration, I am proposing a counteroffer of $1450000 for the product. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of our offering while considering your financial situation.
